SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Placeholder admin account representation.
AdminActivity
The primary admin dashboard activity.
AdminEventAdapter
Adapter for displaying a list of events in the admin dashboard
AdminEventAdapter.DeleteListener
Triggered when an admin taps the delete button.
AdminEventListFragment
This is the list fragment that renders list of events in the admin dashboard.
AdminImageAdapter
Adapter for showing uploaded images to administrators.
AdminImageAdapter.DeleteListener
Triggered when an admin taps the delete image button.
AdminImageListFragment
This is the list fragment that renders images in the admin dashboard
AdminPagerAdapter
Supplies admin dashboard fragments to the ViewPager
AdminProfileAdapter
Adapter used for rendering entrant profiles in the admin dashboard.
AdminProfileAdapter.DeleteListener
Notifies when an admin requests to remove a profile.
AdminProfileListFragment
Displays entrant profiles for administrators.
DateUtil
Class containing utilities working with Date objects
DeletionConfirmationUtil
Utility wrapper that builds a consistent deletion confirmation dialog.
Entrant
Represents an entrant using the app and stores their profile information.
EntrantActivity
Launcher screen for entrant-specific tools and shortcuts.
EntrantController
Coordinates Firestore persistence for entrant profile information.
EntrantHistoryItem
Represents a single history record for an entrant.
EntrantProfileActivity
Activity that allows entrants to capture and persist their profile details.
EntrantRow
Lightweight view model for rendering entrant rows.
EntrantViewFragment
Placeholder fragment for previewing entrant-facing screens.
Event
Represents an event that entrants can view and join waiting lists for.
EventAdapter
Recycler adapter rendering the list of events available to entrants.
EventAdapter.OnEventClickListener
Interface to notify listeners when an event is selected.
EventCardAdapter
Card-based adapter for showing organizer events with a CTA to view entrants.
EventCardAdapter.OnViewEntrants
Callback for when the entrants button is pressed.
EventController
Handles event retrieval and filtering logic between Firestore and the UI.
EventDetailsActivity
Displays event details and lets entrants manage their waiting list status.
EventHistoryActivity
Shows the entrant's historical event participation details.
EventHistoryAdapter
Displays entrant event history entries in a recycler view.
EventListActivity
Displays a list of events and exposes filtering for entrant interests and availability.
FirebaseUtil
Utility helpers for accessing configured Firebase services.
FirestoreManager
Placeholder for future Firestore helpers.
Image
Image model class for storing image information
ImageController
Handle image retrieval and saving to Firestore
LoginActivity
Handles Firestore-backed user login and role-based routing.
MainActivity
Temporary launcher to navigate between entrant demo screens.
Organizer
Placeholder organizer model for future expansion.
OrganizerActivity
Hosts the organizer dashboard tabs for managing and creating events.
OrganizerEventsFragment
Fragment displaying all events created by the logged-in organizer.
OrganizerPagerAdapter
Supplies organizer dashboard fragments to the ViewPager.
OrganizerToolsFragment
Provides organizers with a simple form to create events and preview QR codes.
QrUtil
Helper for generating QR code bitmaps.
SessionManager
Utility for managing Firestore-backed sessions by clearing the deviceId binding on logout.
SessionManager.LogoutCallback
Notified once logout cleanup completes.
SignupActivity
Collects minimal credentials and creates entrant accounts in Firestore.
SimpleEntrantAdapter
Minimal adapter used by admin tools to show entrant records.
SplashActivity
Entry point that auto-logs users based on stored device identifiers.
WaitingListActivity
Displays a live list of entrants waiting for a specific event.
WaitingListController
Handles operations for joining or leaving event waiting lists.
WaitingListEntry
Represents an entrant's placement on an event waiting list.
